channel.title: Wtf!

item.title: Wtf!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

First you need to click one of the options, and find the ID of the button and add it into ClickingMost.java
Now, in client.java you need to declare:

public void PurePker(){ addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }
Now in ClickingMost.java, after you found the Button ID, add this:

Case *ButtonID*: c.PurePker(); break;

And as for the normal player, you just need to make it close the dialogue when you click it:

case *ButtonID* c.CloseAll();

I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf!
item.dc:creator: @xdragondavyx xdragondavyx
item.description:
@xdragondavyx wrote:

Hi there I was coding and i want to make something
example (this i want to make)

if you logged in the first time
there will come a screen in the chatbox

Normal Player
Pure

If you select normal player you will become level 3
If you select Pure you will become a pure
I got the command copied from a source

			sendFrame171(1, 2465);
			sendFrame171(0, 2468);
			sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
			sendFrame126("Normal Player", 2461);
			sendFrame126("Pure Pker", 2462);
			sendFrame164(2459);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

How i insert codes in it? if i select pure pker it needs to give skills
how i do that?

Read full topic
